autoAcceptAllPrompts.description: Say yes to all the prompts from the Storybook CLI migration scripts.

onlyShowListOfCommands.description: Only show the steps that you need to follow in order to migrate. This does NOT make any changes to your code.

noUpgrade.description: Skip upgrading Storybook packages. Only use this option if you are already on version 9, and you do not want to install the packages again.

versionTag.description: The version of Storybook to use. Use 'latest' to use the latest stable version, or 'next' to use the latest beta.
